hero.title: Juan Manuel Paredes
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Welcome to my portfolio. Here you can find my projects and download my resume.

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.description: Mechatronic Engineer with experience in Full Stack development and design of technological solutions for process optimization. I have led the development of digital tools such as a coffee milling control system, digitizing manual processes through web applications that integrate client management, production, and operational calculations. I work with React, Node.js, Python, SQL, and automation tools like RPA and Microsoft Power Automate.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Explore what I have built, each with its own story and technology.
